title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Ontology-Based Customized Java Programming Education Course

context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can write simple programs by utilizing basic Java programming syntax (variables, control statements, arrays, etc.).
Learners can accurately solve more than 80% of personalized practice problems tailored to their individual proficiency levels through an ontology-based learning system.
Learners can explain the four core concepts of Java object-oriented programming (inheritance, polymorphism, abstraction, encapsulation) by connecting them to actual code examples.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
